issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > When adguard protection is running in the background, opening YouTube in either firefox, edge or chrome will result in the screen being blocked by the mosaic, but as soon as adguard protection is turned off and refresh the page, the screen will return to normal. (No custom rules added, adguard maintains default settings) I tried uninstalling ublock but no improvement, but when ublock is the only one running it blocks YouTube ads properly.
